description: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, blending academia and tech expertise. As the founder of Offcourse and creator of Superconnectors, he's dedicated to transforming education and knowledge sharing. His work spans from exploring internet fragmentation and digital landscapes to applying philosophical concepts like Sloterdijk's 'foam' to modern society. yeehaa's courses focus on breaking silos, fostering innovation, and valuing differences. Based in Taipei, he advocates for an impactful and inclusive internet, bringing people together around common values and translating shared visions into effective ecosystems.
blurb: yeehaa, an ecosystem architect with a PhD, merges philosophy and tech to revolutionize education and knowledge sharing. His work explores digital landscapes, internet fragmentation, and innovative approaches to fostering collaborative, decentralized systems.
